Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Stony Island/63rd
ShortDescription: Northbound 6 Jackson Exp buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, 63rd, Haynes Dr., Lk Shr Dr., 57th and Hyde Park Blvd, due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Exp buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, 63rd, Haynes Dr., Lk Shr Dr., 57th and Hyde Park Blvd, due to street blockage near Stony Island/63rd.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
